sys_ui_page.html:
Congratulations!

You've installed this application on your instance.

Next steps;

  • Set up Private Slack Instance at slack.com
  • Create Integration to your instance$[SP]Create App
    1. Choose Bot User
    2. Give it a name and save
    3. On left goto "OAuth $[AMP] Permissions"
    4. Add a scope of "Send messages as "
    5. On left goto "Install App"
    6. On left goto "Event Subscriptions"
      1. Enable it
      2. Set Request URL to https://${gs.getProperty('instance_name')}.service-now.com/api/x_snc_slack_points/handle_slack_events
      3. Add Workspace Event `message.channels`
    7. In Servicenow open property, "x_snc_slack_points.slack_bot_token", and set it to be private, save it
    8. Copy the "Bot User OAuth Access Token" into the properties value, save it
  • Create your custom feature
